CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 18, 1941, page 4 reads: "The Tech Ice Cream Co., treated Bill Bojanglles Robinson last Tuesday morning to a 50- pound Eskimo Pie, which is Bojangles favorite dessert. Bill doesn't drink and is moderate in his habits. From all appearances he is enjoying the idea! The presentation was broadcast by radio station WWSW with the announcer shown on the right.--Harris Photo.
TitMainTitle: Bill "Bojangles" Robinson holding large Eskimo Pie ice cream bar and Joe Tucker holding Warner Brothers Circus Management Corporation document, gathered around WWSW microphone in radio studio
